intent_atoms.description: No active research tasks beyond the items listed below.
Extend ParseTreeNode with Issues and Status Fields to emit tolerant parsing metadata, expose status and issues in JSON exports, and surface status indicator in app detail views.
Parse tree nodes must emit tolerant parsing metadata; JSON exports must include status and issues fields; app detail views must display the status indicator.
VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts is blocked without hardware.
Track manual VoiceOver verification on macOS and iPadOS hardware to confirm focus command menu announces controls and restores focus targets as expected.
Manual VoiceOver verification must confirm that focus command menu announces controls and restores focus targets.
Real-World Assets task is blocked awaiting external licensing approvals.
Secure Dolby Vision, AV1.. etc. to shift regression baselines from synthetic payloads once approvals land.
Licensing approvals must be obtained for Dolby Vision….

functional_units.name: ParseTreeNode Metadata Extension
functional_units.description: Adds issues and status fields to parse tree nodes, exposing tolerant parsing metadata in JSON exports and UI detail views.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Accessibility Verification
functional_units.description: Manually tracks VoiceOver focus command menu announcements and focus restoration on macOS and iPadOS hardware.

functional_units.name: Real-World Asset Licensing
functional_units.description: Secures external licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures to enable realistic regression baselines.

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Refresh
functional_units.description: Automates refreshing of snapshots and CLI fixtures when schema updates occur via a regeneration flag and test command.
